title: How to Make Pizza Dough Without Yeast

steps.headline: Combine the flour, baking powder, and salt in a medium mixing bowl.
Add the warm water and the oil.
Stir all ingredients together until the mixture forms a ball.
steps.description: (Add more water if the dough becomes too stiff.)

steps.headline: Turn out the dough onto a floured cutting board and knead the ball of dough gently for a few minutes.
steps.description: The dough should be soft, but not sticky. Sprinkle a little flour on the dough if it is too sticky to knead.

steps.headline: Spread the dough onto a pizza pan or a flat baking sheet.
steps.description: Smooth out the dough so that it is uniformly even.

steps.headline: Remove pizza from oven and add desired toppings.

text: Combine the flour, baking powder, and salt in a medium mixing bowl.  Add the warm water and the oil.  Stir all ingredients together until the mixture forms a ball. (Add more water if the dough becomes too stiff.) Turn out the dough onto a floured cutting board and knead the ball of dough gently for a few minutes. The dough should be soft, but not sticky. Sprinkle a little flour on the dough if it is too sticky to knead. Spread the dough onto a pizza pan or a flat baking sheet. Smooth out the dough so that it is uniformly even. Bake at 400°F (204°C) for 15 to 25 minutes.  Remove pizza from oven and add desired toppings.
